issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Please see attached Alloy project. On a Samsung Galaxy Nexus running Android 4.3, it's very difficult to edit the text field because it seems to lose focus as soon as you click on it.

I tried this on 3 other Android devices running various Android versions and could not find any other device exhibiting this problem.
fields.summary: Text field in table won't retain focus on some Android devices

comments.body:
Verifying that has been fixed as I am unable to reproduce this issue with the following environment;
Pixel (7.1)
Studio 4.9.0.201705302345
Ti SDK 6.1.1 GA
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.2
Ti CLI 5.0.14
Alloy 1.9.11
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
Java 1.8.0_131
